sentence.text: AN MP has blasted as ` criminal " the ferrying across Cleveland of critically ill patients in a search for available beds .
THE GIRLFRIEND : Dutch runner Petra blasted Jason for being ` so stupid "
Before they left they blasted the Government for demolishing more than 400,000 jobs in the industry in three years .
The servant also said Mick phoned Jerry on Monday and blasted her for discussing their marriage in public .
Nationally , union leaders blasted the Government for failing to tackle the jobs crisis and even some reaction from the business sector was muted .
And she blasts supermarkets for failing to pass on profits to customers by cutting prices .
The Manchester-based singer blasted the comic for parodying him on TV with his madcap character Morrissey the Consumer Monkey .
THREE-TIMES world champion Nelson Piquet , who survived an Indy horror crash three months ago , last night blasted Nigel Mansell for quitting Formula One .
KYLIE MINOGUE has blasted Madonna for ripping off other people 's styles .
CO blasts Beeb for ` 50 boobs "
And now bosses of Dewsbury hospital , Yorks , have blasted staff for ` failing in their duty " to ease his last hours .
MANAGER Ray Hankin blasted his side for ` defending like amateurs " after errors cost Quakers the chance of lifting themselves off the bottom of the table .
Now India Cricket Board secretary Chandappa Nagaraj has blasted Gower for a ` malicious statement made in very bad taste " .
Petra , 19 , a member of the Dutch sprint relay team , blasted Livingston for his ` stupid , stupid action " .
The inquiry also blasted Mr Evans for standing too close to the start- line .
Billy Graham blasted Communism on the Deity 's behalf : ` A great sinister anti-Christian movement masterminded by Satan has declared war upon the Christian God ! "
If she queried anything , he blasted her with expertise .
LOVE-cheat minister David Mellor was last night blasted by British architects after his ministry awarded a plum £6million contract to an AMERICAN firm .
EDUCATION leaders have rallied to the defence of a school blasted by government inspectors .
THE POLICE organisers of the Mersey raft race were blasted today after one man was taken to hospital and several others were rescued by the emergency services .
THE High Street banks were blasted for profiteering as they rushed to cash in on the interest rate jump .
But the report also blasts authority bosses for failing to control the activities of 58-year-old Mr Watney , who took early retirement last year .
THREE weeks ago Clough blasted England 's tactics
And she blasted Tory plans to force more schools to quit town hall control .
Birmingham boss Terry Cooper blasted his players after they crashed out of the Cup with a 3-0 loss at Lucchese .
ARSENAL boss George Graham last night blasted his multi-million pound stars for squandering the qualities which made them giants of English football .
England hooker Brian Moore last night blasted South Africa as ` living offside . "
Gower responded in his book ` Gower " by describing the England captain as driven by money and blasted former team manager Micky Stewart 's soccer-style approach .
Anti-smoking campaigner Princess Diana has blasted those who claim -- ` from behind a cloud of smoke " -- that smoking is not addictive .
Mr Clark blasts his old boss , former Defence Secretary Tom King as ` indecisive , blustering and bullying . "
